articles.author: Tereza Pultarova
articles.title: Watch new NASA sensor measure US air pollution from space in real time (video) - Space.com
articles.description: The TEMPO instrument is the first to monitor air pollution levels across America in real time.
articles.content:
The first images from NASA's new spaceborne air pollution sensor reveal how levels of toxic pollutants change within a day across the United States. 
The images taken by the Tropospheric Emissions: … [+3323 chars]
